## getCageTotalBounds() function

Calculate the minimum and maximum possible totals for a cage of given size

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getCageTotalBounds(cageSize: number, maxValue: number): {
    min: number;
    max: number;
};
```

</td><td>

Number of cells in the cage


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>

number


</td><td>

Maximum value allowed in a cell (e.g., 9 for 9x9, 16 for 16x16)


</td></tr>

**Returns:**

{ min: number; max: number; }

Object with min and max possible totals
